### about
I am a master's student working in Pedro Goncalvesâ€™ lab since July 2023. I am broadly interested in multisensory integration.

Before joining the lab, I was a molecular biology and genetucs undergradaute student at [Bilkent University](https://www.bilkent.edu/bilkent/). ...
